items.content_text:
### Featured (new releases)

*   ğŸ”§ [(Unofficial) Firebase Admin SDK for PHP (â­2.4k)](https://github.com/kreait/firebase-php) - The Firebase Admin PHP SDK enables access to Firebase services from privileged environments (such as servers or cloud) in PHP.

### Mobile

*   ğŸ“ [App Distribution App Bundles](https://firebase.googleblog.com/2021/05/app-distribution-adds-support-to-android-app-bundles.html) - Support for Android App Bundles (AAB) is officially supported in App Distribution.

### CLI & Editor / iOS

*   ğŸ“– [Storage in Emulator Suite](https://firebase.google.com/docs/emulator-suite/connect_storage) - Emulator suite is now complete!

### Other / iOS

*   ğŸ”§ [FireCMS](https://firecms.co/docs/) - FireCMS is an open source headless CMS and admin panel built by developers for developers. It generates CRUD views based on your configuration.

items.title: Awesome Firebase Updates on Jul 05 - Jul 11, 2021
items.summary: 20 awesome projects updated on Jul 05 - Jul 11, 2021
items.content_text:
### Featured (new releases)

*   ğŸ“– [App Check](https://firebase.google.com/docs/app-check) - Protect your backend resources from abuse, such as billing fraud or phishing.
*   ğŸ“– [Firestore Data Bundles](https://firebase.google.com/docs/firestore/bundles) - Data Bundles are static query results for CDN caching to speed first page loads.
*   ğŸ“– [Modular Web SDK (v9)](https://firebase.google.com/docs/web/learn-more#modular-version) - Import only what you need reducing SDK size up to 80%.

### Firebase Extensions

*   ğŸ”§ [Firebase Extensions](https://firebase.google.com/products/extensions) - Firebase Extensions provide extended functionality to your apps without the need to research, write, or debug code on your own.
*   ğŸ”§ [Experimental Firebase Extensions (â­248)](https://github.com/FirebaseExtended/experimental-extensions) -  laboratory for new extensions created by Firebase.
*   ğŸ”§ [Stripe Extensions (â­461)](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-firebase-extensions) - Official Stripe subscriptions and invoices extensions.
*   ğŸ”§ [MessageBird Extensions (â­11)](https://github.com/messagebird/firestore-send-msg) - Official MessageBird extension to send messages via the MessageBird Converstations API.
*   ğŸ”§ [Algolia Extensions (â­118)](https://github.com/algolia/firestore-algolia-search) - Official Algolia extension to enable full text search of Cloud Firestore with Algolia.
*   ğŸ”§ [Mailchimp Extensions (â­20)](https://github.com/mailchimp/Firebase) - Official Mailchimp extension to sync Firebase Authentication events to create member tags, merge fields, and member events with Mailchimp.
*   ğŸ”§ [Typesense Extension for Full-Text Search (â­168)](https://github.com/typesense/firestore-typesense-search) - Official Typesense extension to add full-text search in Firestore, by syncing the data to [Typesense (â­24k)](https://github.com/typesense/typesense), an OSS alternative to Algolia.

### Web

*   ğŸ”Œ [GeoFirestore (â­509)](https://github.com/MichaelSolati/geofirestore-js) - Location-based querying and filtering using Firebase Firestore.

### Server-side (Cloud Functions, BigQuery etc) / iOS

*   ğŸ”Œ [Pyrebase (â­2.1k)](https://github.com/thisbejim/Pyrebase) - A simple python wrapper for the Firebase API.
*   ğŸ”Œ [Firecode (â­0)](https://github.com/kafkas/firecode) - A light, fast, and memory-efficient collection traversal library for Firestore and Node.js.

### CLI & Editor / iOS

*   ğŸ”§ [asdf-firebase (â­18)](https://github.com/jthegedus/asdf-firebase) - An [asdf-vm](https://asdf-vm.com/) plugin for `firebase-tools`. Manage your Firebase CLI without Node.js or `npm`! Great for `python`, `golang`, `c++` & `java` Firebase projects.

### Other / iOS

*   ğŸ“¹ [Firebase Summit 2020](https://goo.gle/firebasesummit2020) - All Firebase talks @ the Firebase Summit 2020.

### Follow / Official

*   ğŸ“¹ [Firebase YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/Firebase)
*   ğŸ“ [Firebase Blog](https://firebase.googleblog.com/)
*   ğŸ¦ [@firebase](https://twitter.com/firebase)
*   ğŸ‘¤ [Firebase Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/Firebase)
*   ğŸ”Š [The Firebase Podcast](https://podcasts.google.com/feed/aHR0cDovL2ZpcmViYXNlcG9kY2FzdC5nb29nbGVkZXZlbG9wZXJzLmxpYnN5bnByby5jb20vcnNz) - This is the place where we dive deep into Firebase products and learn new tips and tricks along the way.
items.content_html:
Featured (new releases)

  • ğŸ“– App Check - Protect your backend resources from abuse, such as billing fraud or phishing.
  • ğŸ“– Firestore Data Bundles - Data Bundles are static query results for CDN caching to speed first page loads.
  • ğŸ“– Modular Web SDK (v9) - Import only what you need reducing SDK size up to 80%.

Firebase Extensions

  • ğŸ”§ Firebase Extensions - Firebase Extensions provide extended functionality to your apps without the need to research, write, or debug code on your own.
  • ğŸ”§ Experimental Firebase Extensions (â­248) - laboratory for new extensions created by Firebase.
  • ğŸ”§ Stripe Extensions (â­461) - Official Stripe subscriptions and invoices extensions.
  • ğŸ”§ MessageBird Extensions (â­11) - Official MessageBird extension to send messages via the MessageBird Converstations API.
  • ğŸ”§ Algolia Extensions (â­118) - Official Algolia extension to enable full text search of Cloud Firestore with Algolia.
  • ğŸ”§ Mailchimp Extensions (â­20) - Official Mailchimp extension to sync Firebase Authentication events to create member tags, merge fields, and member events with Mailchimp.
  • ğŸ”§ Typesense Extension for Full-Text Search (â­168) - Official Typesense extension to add full-text search in Firestore, by syncing the data to Typesense (â­24k), an OSS alternative to Algolia.

Web

  • ğŸ”Œ GeoFirestore (â­509) - Location-based querying and filtering using Firebase Firestore.

Server-side (Cloud Functions, BigQuery etc) / iOS

  • ğŸ”Œ Pyrebase (â­2.1k) - A simple python wrapper for the Firebase API.
  • ğŸ”Œ Firecode (â­0) - A light, fast, and memory-efficient collection traversal library for Firestore and Node.js.

CLI & Editor / iOS

  • ğŸ”§ asdf-firebase (â­18) - An asdf-vm plugin for firebase-tools. Manage your Firebase CLI without Node.js or npm! Great for python, golang, c++ & java Firebase projects.

Other / iOS

  • ğŸ“¹ Firebase Summit 2020 - All Firebase talks @ the Firebase Summit 2020.

Follow / Official

  • ğŸ“¹ Firebase YouTube
  • ğŸ“ Firebase Blog
  • ğŸ¦ @firebase
  • ğŸ‘¤ Firebase Facebook
  • ğŸ”Š The Firebase Podcast - This is the place where we dive deep into Firebase products and learn new tips and tricks along the way.

items.title: Awesome Firebase Updates on Oct 14 - Oct 20, 2019
items.summary: 64 awesome projects updated on Oct 14 - Oct 20, 2019
items.content_text:
### Official Docs & Quickstarts

*   ğŸ“– [Firebase Documentation](https://firebase.google.com/docs) - Official Firebase Documentation.
*   ğŸ”§ [Firebase Status Dashboard](https://status.firebase.google.com) - This page provides status information on the services that are part of Firebase.
*   ğŸ’¡ [Firebase Quickstarts](https://github.com/firebase?utf8=%E2%9C%93\&q=quickstart\&type=\&language=) - Official Firebase Quickstarts.
*   ğŸ’¡ [Google Codelabs | Firebase](https://codelabs.developers.google.com/?cat=Firebase) - Google Developers Codelabs provide a guided, tutorial, hands-on coding experience.

### Web

*   ğŸ”Œ [React Firebase Hooks (â­3.6k)](https://github.com/CSFrequency/react-firebase-hooks) - React Hooks for Firebase services.
*   ğŸ”Œ [Firebase UI (â­4.7k)](https://github.com/firebase/firebaseui-web) - FirebaseUI is an open-source JavaScript library for Web that provides simple, customizable UI bindings on top of Firebase SDKs to eliminate boilerplate code and promote best practices.
*   ğŸ”Œ [Firebase UI for React (â­1.3k)](https://github.com/firebase/firebaseui-web-react) - React Wrapper for firebaseUI Web.
*   ğŸ”Œ [GeoFire for JavaScript (â­1.4k)](https://github.com/firebase/geofire-js) - Realtime location queries with Firebase.
*   ğŸ’¡ [FirePad (â­3.9k)](https://github.com/FirebaseExtended/firepad) - Collaborative Text Editor Powered by Firebase.
*   ğŸ”Œ [Ember Fire (â­684)](https://github.com/firebase/emberFire) - Official Ember data adapter for Firebase.
*   ğŸ”Œ [Firebase Dart (â­402)](https://github.com/FirebaseExtended/firebase-dart) - Dart wrapper for Firebase.
*   ğŸ”Œ [PolymerFire (â­457)](https://github.com/FirebaseExtended/polymerfire) - Polymer Web Components for Firebase.
*   ğŸ”Œ [VueFire (â­3.9k)](https://github.com/vuejs/vuefire) - Firebase bindings for Vue.js.
*   ğŸ”Œ [Angular Fire 2 (â­7.8k)](https://github.com/angular/angularfire2) - Official library for Firebase and Angular.
*   ğŸ”Œ [Re-base (â­2.1k)](https://github.com/tylermcginnis/re-base) - Relay inspired library for building React.js + Firebase applications.
*   ğŸ”Œ [React Redux Firebase (â­2.5k)](https://github.com/prescottprue/react-redux-firebase) - Redux bindings for Firebase. Includes Higher Order Component for use with React.
*   ğŸ”Œ [GatsbyJS Firebase Data Source](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/packages/) - Query your Firebase data right into your statically generated pages with Gatsby.
*   ğŸ”Œ [Apollo Link Firebase (â­405)](https://github.com/Canner/apollo-link-firebase) - Provides a local GraphQL interface to RealtimeDB. DB syncs locally to device, Apollo Link provides querying into the local DB.
*   ğŸ”Œ [BuckleScript Bindings for Firebase (â­42)](https://github.com/avohq/bs-firebase) - BuckleScript bindings for Firebase for use in ReasonML projects.
*   ğŸ’¡ [Angular Firebase PWA (â­967)](https://github.com/codediodeio/angular-firestarter) - Is an Angular PWA powered by Firebase. It can serve as a foundation to learn this stack and roll out more complex features.
*   ğŸ”Œ [FireSQL (â­351)](https://github.com/jsayol/FireSQL) - Query Firestore using SQL syntax. Issues the minimum amount of queries necessary in order to get the data that you request.
*   ğŸ“– [Hosting Version History](https://firebase.google.com/docs/hosting/deploying#set_limit_for_retained_versions) - Automatic deletion of older versions of your site deployments.
*   ğŸ”Œ [Firestorter (â­384)](https://github.com/IjzerenHein/firestorter) - Use Firestore in React with zero effort, using MobX (also for react-native).
*   ğŸ’¡ [Nextbase (â­15)](https://github.com/martyan/nextbase) - Boilerplate of Next.js, Redux & Firebase for developers who want a quick start project.

### Mobile

*   ğŸ“– [Firebase Flutter Documentation](https://firebase.google.com/docs/flutter/setup) - Official Firebase Flutter Setup.

*   ğŸ”Œ [React Native Firebase (â­12k)](https://github.com/invertase/react-native-firebase) - Well-tested feature rich modular Firebase implementation for React Native. Supports both iOS & Android platforms.
*   ğŸ’¡ [Expo Native Firebase (â­217)](https://github.com/EvanBacon/expo-native-firebase) - Native Firebase Expo App (iOS, Android) Demo for Firestore, Notifications, Analytics, Storage, Messaging, Database.

### Mobile / Android

*   ğŸ”Œ [GeoFire for Java (â­670)](https://github.com/firebase/geofire-java) - Realtime location queries with Firebase.
*   ğŸ”Œ [Firebase UI (â­4.7k)](https://github.com/firebase/firebaseui-android) - Optimized UI components for Firebase.
*   ğŸ”Œ [FireXtensions (â­29)](https://github.com/rosariopfernandes/firextensions) - Unofficial Kotlin Extensions for the Firebase Android SDK.

### Mobile / iOS

*   ğŸ”Œ [GeoFire for Objective-C (â­442)](https://github.com/firebase/geofire-objc) - Realtime location queries with Firebase.

*   ğŸ’¡ [MLKit - ARCore (â­11)](https://github.com/FirebaseExtended/MLKit-ARCore) - Example detecting objects and tags them with 3D labels in Augmented Reality. Uses Firebase ML Kit, ARCore and Firebase RTDB.
*   ğŸ’¡ [MLKit - ARKit (â­34)](https://github.com/FirebaseExtended/MLKit-ARKit) - Example detecting objects using Firebase ML Kit and tags them with 3D labels in Augmented Reality.

### Server-side (Cloud Functions, BigQuery etc) / iOS

*   ğŸ“– [Firebase Admin Documentation](https://firebase.google.com/docs/admin/setup) - Official Firebase Admin SDK Server Setup.

*   ğŸ“¹ [Official Cloud Function #Firecasts](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2mjfI0FYP7Y\&list=PLl-K7zZEsYLm9A9rcHb1IkyQUu6QwbjdM) - YouTube video series about understanding how Cloud Functions work.
*   ğŸ“ [Firebase Hosting for Cloud Run Services](https://firebase.googleblog.com/2019/04/firebase-hosting-and-cloud-run.html) - Dynamic content with Hosting Rewrites & Cloud Run Services.
*   ğŸ“ [Scheduled (Cron) Cloud Functions for Firebase](https://firebase.googleblog.com/2019/04/schedule-cloud-functions-firebase-cron.html) - Firebase-native Cron triggers for Firebase Cloud Functions.
*   ğŸ”Œ [Integrify (â­110)](https://github.com/anishkny/integrify) - Enforce referential and data integrity in Firestore using pre-canned Cloud Functions triggers.

### CLI & Editor / iOS

*   ğŸ”§ [VSCode Firebase Explorer (â­152)](https://github.com/jsayol/vscode-firebase-explorer) - Explore and manage your Firebase projects.
*   ğŸ”§ [Firebase Tools (â­4.2k)](https://github.com/firebase/firebase-tools) - The Firebase Command Line Tools.
*   ğŸ”§ [Firebase CI (â­72)](https://github.com/prescottprue/firebase-ci) - Simplified Firebase interaction for continuous integration.
*   ğŸ”§ [Firebase Firestore Snippets (â­14)](https://github.com/peterhdd/firebase-firestore-snippets) - Contains the snippet for both Firebase and Firestore in VS Code editor.
*   ğŸ”§ [Fuego (â­218)](https://github.com/sgarciac/fuego) - Firestore client CLI supporting document add/update/query with filtering and pagination.
*   ğŸ”§ [Firestore Rules Generator (â­199)](https://github.com/FirebaseExtended/protobuf-rules-gen) - Official (but experimental) Firebase Rules Generator for Cloud Firestore based on Google's Protocol Buffer format.
*   ğŸ”§ [Firepit (â­25)](https://github.com/abehaskins/firepit) - Firepit is a standalone, portable version of the Firebase CLI which has no depedencies (including Node.js).
*   ğŸ”§ [Fireward (â­237)](https://github.com/bijoutrouvaille/fireward) - Easy to use language for Firestore rules, similar to Firebase Bolt.

*   ğŸ”Œ [FireDrill (â­67)](https://github.com/scottlepp/fire-drill) - Find, Edit, Add, Remove, Import, Export, and Report on your Firebase data.

*   ğŸ“¹ [Firebase @ Google IO '19](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLl-K7zZEsYLlo2L4rfPds-fFLEtOWheoO) - All Firebase talks @ Google IO 2019.

items.content_html:
Official Docs & Quickstarts

  • ğŸ“– Firebase Documentation - Official Firebase Documentation.

  • ğŸ’¡ Google Codelabs | Firebase - Google Developers Codelabs provide a guided, tutorial, hands-on coding experience.

Web

  • ğŸ”Œ React Firebase Hooks (â­3.6k) - React Hooks for Firebase services.
  • ğŸ”Œ Firebase UI (â­4.7k) - FirebaseUI is an open-source JavaScript library for Web that provides simple, customizable UI bindings on top of Firebase SDKs to eliminate boilerplate code and promote best practices.
  • ğŸ”Œ Firebase UI for React (â­1.3k) - React Wrapper for firebaseUI Web.
  • ğŸ”Œ GeoFire for JavaScript (â­1.4k) - Realtime location queries with Firebase.
  • ğŸ’¡ FirePad (â­3.9k) - Collaborative Text Editor Powered by Firebase.
  • ğŸ”Œ Ember Fire (â­684) - Official Ember data adapter for Firebase.
  • ğŸ”Œ Firebase Dart (â­402) - Dart wrapper for Firebase.
  • ğŸ”Œ PolymerFire (â­457) - Polymer Web Components for Firebase.
  • ğŸ”Œ VueFire (â­3.9k) - Firebase bindings for Vue.js.
  • ğŸ”Œ Angular Fire 2 (â­7.8k) - Official library for Firebase and Angular.
  • ğŸ”Œ Re-base (â­2.1k) - Relay inspired library for building React.js + Firebase applications.
  • ğŸ”Œ React Redux Firebase (â­2.5k) - Redux bindings for Firebase. Includes Higher Order Component for use with React.
  • ğŸ”Œ GatsbyJS Firebase Data Source - Query your Firebase data right into your statically generated pages with Gatsby.
  • ğŸ”Œ Apollo Link Firebase (â­405) - Provides a local GraphQL interface to RealtimeDB. DB syncs locally to device, Apollo Link provides querying into the local DB.
  • ğŸ”Œ BuckleScript Bindings for Firebase (â­42) - BuckleScript bindings for Firebase for use in ReasonML projects.
  • ğŸ’¡ Angular Firebase PWA (â­967) - Is an Angular PWA powered by Firebase. It can serve as a foundation to learn this stack and roll out more complex features.
  • ğŸ”Œ FireSQL (â­351) - Query Firestore using SQL syntax. Issues the minimum amount of queries necessary in order to get the data that you request.
  • ğŸ“– Hosting Version History - Automatic deletion of older versions of your site deployments.
  • ğŸ”Œ Firestorter (â­384) - Use Firestore in React with zero effort, using MobX (also for react-native).
  • ğŸ’¡ Nextbase (â­15) - Boilerplate of Next.js, Redux & Firebase for developers who want a quick start project.

items.title: Awesome Firebase Updates on Dec 10 - Dec 16, 2018
items.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on Dec 10 - Dec 16, 2018
items.content_text:
### Mobile

*   ğŸ”Œ [React Native Firebase Cloud Messaging (â­1.7k)](https://github.com/evollu/react-native-fcm) -
    React Native module for Firebase Cloud Messaging and local notification.
*   ğŸ’¡ [Flutter Calendar App (â­78)](https://github.com/mattgraham1/FlutterCalendar) -
    New Flutter application implementing a simple mobile calendar app for storing basic events into Firebase cloud database.
items.content_html:
Mobile

  • ğŸ”Œ React Native Firebase Cloud Messaging (â­1.7k) - React Native module for Firebase Cloud Messaging and local notification.
  • ğŸ’¡ Flutter Calendar App (â­78) - New Flutter application implementing a simple mobile calendar app for storing basic events into Firebase cloud database.
